data.eml:eml: Kiwisaldula (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Saldidae) from the South Island of New Zealand: new species and identification key

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Larivière, Marie-Claude, Larochelle, André (2018): Kiwisaldula (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Saldidae) from the South Island of New Zealand: new species and identification key. Zootaxa 4514 (2): 151-166, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4514.2.1
